• Evids
  • WinProcs

Evids
Star

Evids is a list of known artifacts to check which can give you an insight of user activities.

This was inspired by the GTFOBins project for Windows. Initial data taken from SANS poster - “Evidence of..”.

List of available categories available here

  • File Download
  • Program Execution
  • Deleted File or File Knowledge
  • Network Activity / Physical Location
  • File/Folder Opening
  • Account Usage
  • External Device/USB Usage
  • Browser Usage
Artifact Categories
XP Search – ACMRU
  • Deleted File or File Knowledge
ADS Zone.Identifier
  • File Download
Amcache.hve
  • Program Execution
BAM/DAM
  • Program Execution
Browser Artifacts
  • File Download
Browser Download Manager
  • File Download
Browser Search Terms
  • Network Activity / Physical Location
Cookies
  • Network Activity / Physical Location
  • Browser Usage
Email Attachments
  • File Download
IE|Edge file://
  • Deleted File or File Knowledge
  • File/Folder Opening
Jump Lists
  • Program Execution
  • File/Folder Opening
Last-Visited MRU
  • Program Execution
  • Deleted File or File Knowledge
  • File/Folder Opening
Network History
  • Network Activity / Physical Location
Open/Save MRU
  • File Download
Prefetch
  • Program Execution
  • File/Folder Opening
RecentApps
  • Program Execution
Recycle Bin (Win7/8/10)
  • Deleted File or File Knowledge
Recycle Bin (WinXP)
  • Deleted File or File Knowledge
Shimcache
  • Program Execution
Skype History
  • File Download
System Resource Usage Monitor (SRUM)
  • Program Execution
  • Network Activity / Physical Location
Thumbcache
  • Deleted File or File Knowledge
Thumbs.db
  • Deleted File or File Knowledge

  • Network Activity / Physical Location

  • Program Execution

  • Program Execution

  • Network Activity / Physical Location
